token.Enter your Email and instructions will b: Podaj swój adres e-mail, a otrzymasz na niego instrukcje!

token.Below you will find all the links for ev: Poniżej znajdują się linki do wszystkiego, co jest związane z Organizr

token.Subject: Temat
token.The Database will contain sensitive info: Baza zawierać będzie wrażliwe dane. Proszę umieścić ją poza katalogiem strony.
token.Head on over to POEditor and help us tra: Przejdź do POEditor i pomóż nam przetłumaczyć Organizr na Twój język
token.Please make sure both Token and Machine: Upewnij się, że pola Token i ID urządzenia są wypełnione
token.If you signed in with a Emby Acct... Ple: Jeśli zalogowano się za pomocą konta Emby - użyj poniższego linku, aby zmienić hasło:
token.If you signed in with a Plex Acct... Ple: Jeśli zalogowano się za pomocą konta Plex - użyj poniższego linku, aby zmienić hasło:
token.The Registration Password will lockout t: Hasło rejestracyjne będzie blokować pole rejestracyjne. [Generowane przez użytkownika]
token.The Hash Key will be used to decrypt all: Klucz hash będzie używany do odszyfrowywania wszystkich haseł itp... na serwerze. [Generowane przez użytkownika]
token.If using Plex or Emby - It is suggested: Jeśli korzystasz z Plex lub Emby - zaleca się użycie nazwy użytkownika i e-maila konta administratora.
token.Business has Media items hidden [Plex, E: Komercyjna posiada ukryte elementy multimediów [Plex, Emby, itp.]
token.Personal has everything unlocked - no re: Prywatna posiada wszystko odblokowane - brak ograniczeń
token.Please set tab as [New Window] on next s: Ustaw kartę jako [Nowe okno] na następnym ekranie
token.Tab can be set as iFrame: Karta może być ustawiona jako iFrame
token.The value of #987654 is just a placehold: Wartość #987654 jest tylko zastępcza i możesz zmienić ją na dowolną inną.
token.This is not the same as database authent: Nie jest to równoznaczne z uwierzytelnianiem bazy danych - np. Uwierzytelnianie Plex | Uwierzytelnianie Emby | Uwierzytelnianie FTP
token.Minimum Authentication for Message and S: Minimalne uwierzytelnienie dla wiadomości i dźwięku
token.Use Get Plex Machine Button: Użyj przycisku Pobierz ID urządzenia Plex
token.Only use if you have Emby in a reverse p: Używaj tylko, jeśli masz Emby za odwrotnym proxy
token.Only use if you have Plex in a reverse p: Używaj tylko, jeśli masz Plex za odwrotnym proxy
token.Theme CSS [Can replace colors from above: Motyw CSS [Może zastąpić kolory z góry]
token.Custom CSS [Can replace colors from abov: Niestandardowy CSS [Może zastąpić kolory z góry]
token.Copy code and paste inside left box: Skopiuj kod i wklej w lewym polu
token.Download and unzip file and place in: Pobierz plik, rozpakuj i umieść w
token.Click [Generate your Favicons and HTML c: Kliknij [Wygeneruj swoje ikony i kod HTML]
token.At bottom of page on [Favicon Generator: Na dole strony strony, w [Opcjach generatora ikon] pod [Ścieżka] wybierz [Nie mogę lub nie chcę umieszczać plików ikon w katalogu głównym mojej witryny.]
token.Title: Tytuł
token.Name: Imię
token.Account prefix - i.e. Controller\\ from: Prefiks konta - tj. Kontroler\z Kontrolera\Nazwa użytkownika dla AD - uid= dla OpenLDAP

token.unless the URL ends in: chyba że URL kończy się na

token.To revert back to default, save with no: Aby przywrócić domyślne, zapisz bez zdefiniowanej wartości w odpowiednim polu.
token.Use Logo instead of Title on Login Page: Użyj logo zamiast tytułu na stronie logowania
token.Emby User to be used as template for new: Użytkownik Emby jako szablon dla nowych użytkowników
token.Enable Debug Output on Email Test: Włącz wynik debugowania w e-mailu testowym
token.only domain and tld - i.e. domain.com: tylko domena i tld - tj. domena.com
token.Develop Branch Users - Please switch to: Użytkownicy gałęzi Develop - Tymczasowo zmieńcie ją na Master
token.Important Messages - Each message can no: Ważne wiadomości - Każda wiadomość może być teraz zignorowana przyciskiem
token.Drop Certificate file here to upload: Upuść tutaj plik certyfikatu, aby przesłać
token.By default, Organizr uses certificates f: Domyślnie, Organizr używa certyfikatów z https://curl.se/docs/caextract.html
token.If you would like to use your own certif: Jeśli chcesz użyć własnego certyfikatu, prześlij go poniżej. Będziesz wtedy musiał włączyć każdy element strony głównej, aby go używać.
token.Auth Proxy Header Name for Email: Nazwa nagłówka proxy uwierzytelniania dla e-mail
token.Using multiple SSO application will caus: Using multiple SSO application will cause your Cookie Header item to increase.  If you haven't increased it by now, please follow this guide
token.Drag Homepage Items to Order Them: Drag Homepage Items to Order Them
token.Show Organizr Sign out & in Button on Si: Show Organizr Sign out & in Button on Sidebar
token.Money not an option? No problem. Show: Money not an option?  No problem.  Show some love to this Google Ad below:
token.Need specialized support or just want to: Need specialized support or just want to support Organizr?  If so head to Open Collective...
Need specialized support or just want to support Organizr?  If so head to Patreon...
token.Want to donate a small amount of Crypto?: Want to donate a small amount of Crypto?.
Please use the QR Code or Wallet ID.
token.If you use the Square Cash App, you can: If you use the Square Cash App, you can donate with that if you like.
token.I have chosen to go with PayPal Pools so: I have chosen to go with PayPal Pools so everyone can see how much people have donated.
token.Want to show support on Github? Sponsor: Want to show support on Github?  Sponsor me :)
token.If messages get stuck sending, please tu: If messages get stuck sending, please turn this option off.
token.Copy and paste the 4 values into Organiz: Copy and paste the 4 values into Organizr
token.Click the overview tab on top left: Click the overview tab on top left
token.Create an App called whatever you like a: Create an App called whatever you like and choose a cluster (Close to you)
token.Make sure to save before using the impor: Make sure to save before using the import button on Services tab
token.Do not use a Read-Only Token as that wil: Do not use a Read-Only Token as that will not give a correct UUID for sending the results to HealthChecks.io
token.Please use a Full Access Token: Please use a Full Access Token
token.As often as you like - i.e. every 1 minu: As often as you like - i.e. every 1 minute
token.Once this plugin is setup, you will need: Once this plugin is setup, you will need to setup a CRON job
token.After enabling for the first time, pleas: After enabling for the first time, please reload the page - Menu is located under User menu on top right
Open your custom Bookmark page via menu.
token.Create Bookmark tabs in the new area in: Create Bookmark tabs in the new area in
token.Create Bookmark categories in the new ar: Create Bookmark categories in the new area in
token.Will play a sound if the server goes dow: Will play a sound if the server goes down and will play sound if comes back up.
token.Please choose a unique value for added s: Please choose a unique value for added security
token.IPv4 only at the moment - This must be s: IPv4 only at the moment - This must be set to work, will accept subnet or IP address
token.Enable option to set Auth Proxy Header L: Enable option to set Auth Proxy Header Login
token.Text or HTML for recovery password secti: Text or HTML for recovery password section
token.Enables the local address forward if on: Enables the local address forward if on local address and accessed from WAN Domain
token.Full local address of organizr install -: Full local address of organizr install - i.e. http://home.local or http://192.168.0.100
token.Enter domain if you wish to be forwarded: Enter domain if you wish to be forwarded to a local address - Local Address filled out on next item
token.IPv4 only at the moment - This will set: IPv4 only at the moment - This will set your login as local if your IP falls within the From and To
token.Default status of Remember Me button on: Default status of Remember Me button on login screen
token.Number of days cookies and tokens will b: Number of days cookies and tokens will be valid for
token.Enable this to hide the Registration but: Enable this to hide the Registration button on the login screen
token.Sets the password for the Registration f: Sets the password for the Registration form on the login screen
token.WARNING! This will block anyone with the: WARNING! This will block anyone with these IP's
token.WARNING! This can potentially mess up yo: WARNING! This can potentially mess up your iFrames
token.Please use a FQDN on this URL Override: Please use a FQDN on this URL Override
token.This will enable the webserver to forwar: This will enable the webserver to forward errors so traefik will accept them
token.Please make sure to use local IP address: Please make sure to use local IP address and port - You also may use local dns name too.
token.Remember! Please save before using the t: Remember! Please save before using the test button!
token.This will enable the use of TLS for LDAP: This will enable the use of TLS for LDAP connections
token.This will enable the use of SSL for LDAP: This will enable the use of SSL for LDAP connections
token.Enabling this will bypass external 2FA s: Enabling this will bypass external 2FA security if user is on local Subnet
token.Enabling this will only allow Friends th: Enabling this will only allow Friends that have shares to the Machine ID entered above to login, Having this disabled will allow all Friends on your Friends list to login
token.Since you are using the official Docker: Since you are using the official Docker image, you can just restart your Docker container to update Organizr
token.Since you are using the Official Docker: Since you are using the Official Docker image, Change the image to change the branch
token.Choose which Settings Tab to be default: Choose which Settings Tab to be default when opening settings page
token.Please make sure to use the same (sub)do: Please make sure to use the same (sub)domain to access Jellyfin as Organizr's
token.Please make sure to use the local addres: Please make sure to use the local address to the API
token.DO NOT SET THIS TO YOUR ADMIN ACCOUNT. W: DO NOT SET THIS TO YOUR ADMIN ACCOUNT. We recommend you create a local account as a "catch all" for when Organizr is unable to perform SSO.  Organizr will request a User Token based off of this user credentials
token.You may enter multiple URL's using the C: You may enter multiple URL's using the CSV format.  i.e. link#1,link#2,link#3
token.Used to set the description for SEO meta: Used to set the description for SEO meta tags
token.Also sets the title of your site: Also sets the title of your site
token.This feature is experimental - You may f: This feature is experimental - You may face unexpected database is locked errors in logs
token.Toggle this tab to loaded in the backgro: Toggle this tab to loaded in the background on page load
token.Enable Organizr to ping the status of th: Enable Organizr to ping the status of the local URL of this tab
token.Toggle this to add the tab to the Splash: Toggle this to add the tab to the Splash Page on page load
token.Either mark a tab as active or inactive: Either mark a tab as active or inactive
token.You can choose one tab to be the first o: You can choose one tab to be the first opened tab on page load
token.New Window is for items to open in a new: New Window is for items to open in a new window
token.The lowest Group that will have access t: The lowest Group that will have access to this tab
token.Each Tab is assigned a Category, the def: Each Tab is assigned a Category, the default is unsorted.  You may create new categories on the Category settings tab
token.The text that will be displayed for that: The text that will be displayed for that certain tab
token.Please Save before Testing. Note that us: Please Save before Testing. Note that using a blank password might not work correctly.
token.Note that using a blank password might n: Note that using a blank password might not work correctly.
